34.appears_in: 16 p. in Walt Disney's Comics & Stories, no. 596 (Apr. 1995); originally syndicated Aug. 9, 1937 to Feb. 5, 1938.
notes: SUMMARY: Mickey cuts taxes and starts and economic revival, but now he has to marry Phylline; meanwhile Minnie and Duke Varlott are each trying to capture the real king, who's living it up as a "mystery playboy" on the Continent.
